I was invited to serve as an Associate Editor of IEEE Transactions on Big Data , August, 2025. Congratulations! Our paper entitled 'Partial Decode and Compare: An Efficient Verification Scheme for Coded Edge Computing' has won the Runner-up of the 2024 Best Paper Award from IEEE Transactions on Cloud Computing , August, 2025. Our paper entitled 'BotBR: Social Bot Detection with Balanced Feature Fusion and Reliability-Enhanced Graph Learning' has been accepted by SIGIR'25  (CCF rank A), April, 2025. Congratulations to my undergraduate student Haoyu Guo! Our paper entitled 'MACRec: A Meta-learning Enhanced Model for Academic Collaborator Recommendation' has been accepted by CSCWD'25  (CCF rank C, Best Paper Award), February, 2025. Congratulations to my graduate student Yingdan Shi!
